Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12
BuildID=20110222205441

- Load this big image:
http://jeremydouglass.com/gamertextually/images/gt_snowflake_tags-2-ach-large.png

Noticed the following issues:
- Upon loading some percentage,switch between tabs
- Click Minimize and Maximize

Result: System becomes unresponsive. not able to use mouse or keyboard anymore.Had to restart HardBoot

Other issue:
- Wait till the image loads completely
- Switch between Tabs in the browser
- Now Zoom in the image

Result: Image is not redrawn, black background appears

These issues are not seen on Windows platform,checked with winxp,win7
comments.author: aravind@smartware.com
